name: autumn waves sweater
notes:
pattern information
the sweater is worked top down in the round. 
pattern is worked on the yoke as shown in chart. 
the sleeves and body are separated and worked in the round

materials
2 (2 - 3 - 3 – 4 - 4 - 4) skeins of cascata color 03
circular needle 4.5 mm, 40 cm/us 7, 15,75”
circular needle 5 mm, 80 cm/us 8, 31,5”
stitch marker, tapestry needle, waste yarn.

yarn quality
cascata, hobbii
61% cotton, 39% premium acrylic
200 g (7.1 oz) = 400 m (437 yds)

gauge
17 sts x 24 rows = 10 cm x 10 cm/ 4” x 4”
measurements
width: 46 (50-54--60-63-69-73) cm / 18 (19.6-21.2-23.6-24.8-27.1-28.7)”
length: 43 (46-48-56-57-57-57) cm /16.8 (18-19-21.7-22.2-22.2-22.2)”
